00019 #include <l4/re/env>
00020 #include <l4/sys/factory>
00021

00029 namespace L4Re { namespace Core {
00030 Vcon_stream::Vcon_stream(L4::Cap<L4::Vcon> s) throw()
00031 : Be_file_stream(), _s(s), _irq(cap_alloc()->alloc<L4::Irq>())
00032 {
00033 #if 1
00034   //printf("VCON: irq cap = %lx\n", _irq.cap());
00035   int res = l4_error(L4Re::Env::env()->factory()->create_irq(_irq));
00036   //printf("VCON: irq create res=%d\n", res);
00037 
00038   if (res < 0)
00039     return; // handle errors!!!
00040 
00041   res = l4_error(L4::cap_reinterpret_cast<L4::Icu>(_s)->bind(0, _irq));
00042   //printf("VCON: bound irq to con res=%d\n", res);
00043 #endif
00044 }
00045 
00046 ssize_t
00047 Vcon_stream::readv(const struct iovec *iovec, int iovcnt) throw()
00048 {
00049   (void) iovec;
00050   (void) iovcnt;
00051 #if 0
00052   ssize_t bytes = 0;
00053   for (; iovcnt > 0; --iovcnt, ++iovec)
00054     {
00055       if (iovec->iov_len == 0)
00056   continue;
00057 
00058       char *buf = (char *)iovec->iov_base;
00059       size_t len = iovec->iov_len;
00060 
00061       while (1)
00062   {
00063     int ret = _s->read(buf, len);
00064 
00065     // BS: what is this ??
00066     if (ret > (int)len)
00067       ret = len;
00068 
00069     if (ret < 0)
00070       return ret;
00071     else if (ret == 0)
00072       {
00073         if (bytes)
00074     return bytes;
00075 
00076         _irq->detach();
00077         _irq->attach(12, L4::Cap<L4::Thread>::Invalid);
00078         ret = _s->read(buf, len);
00079         if (ret < 0)
00080     return ret;
00081         else if (ret == 0)
00082     {
00083       _irq->receive();
00084       continue;
00085     }
00086       }
00087 
00088     bytes += ret;
00089     len   -= ret;
00090     buf   += ret;
00091 
00092     if (len == 0)
00093       break;
00094   }
00095     }
00096 
00097   return bytes;
00098 #endif
00099   return 0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 ssize_t
00103 Vcon_stream::writev(const struct iovec *iovec, int iovcnt) throw()
00104 {
00105   l4_msg_regs_t store;
00106   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr();
00107 
00108   Vfs_config::memcpy(&store, mr, sizeof(store));
00109 
00110   ssize_t written = 0;
00111   while (iovcnt)
00112     {
00113       size_t sl = iovec->iov_len;
00114       char const *b = (char const *)iovec->iov_base;
00115 
00116       for (; sl > L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE
00117            ; sl -= L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE, b += L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE)
00118         _s->write(b, L4_VCON_WRITE_SIZE);
00119 
00120       _s->write(b, sl);
00121 
00122       written += iovec->iov_len;
00123 
00124       ++iovec;
00125       --iovcnt;
00126     }
00127   Vfs_config::memcpy(mr, &store, sizeof(store));
00128   return written;
00129 }
00130 
00131 int
00132 Vcon_stream::fstat64(struct stat64 *buf) const throw()
00133 {
00134   buf->st_size = 0;
00135   buf->st_mode = 0666;
00136   buf->st_dev = _s.cap();
00137   buf->st_ino = 0;
00138   return 0;
00139 }
00140 
00141 int
00142 Vcon_stream::ioctl(unsigned long request, va_list args) throw()
00143 {
00144   switch (request) {
00145     case TCGETS:
00146   {
00147     //vt100_tcgetattr(term, (struct termios *)argp);
00148 
00149     struct termios *t = va_arg(args, struct termios *);
00150 
00151     l4_vcon_attr_t l4a;
00152     if (!l4_error(_s->get_attr(&l4a)))
00153             {
00154               t->c_iflag = l4a.i_flags;
00155               t->c_oflag = l4a.o_flags; // output flags
00156               t->c_cflag = 0; // control flags
00157               t->c_lflag = l4a.l_flags; // local flags
00158             }
00159           else
00160             t->c_iflag = t->c_oflag = t->c_cflag = t->c_lflag = 0;
00161 #if 0
00162     //t->c_lflag |= ECHO; // if term->echo
00163     t->c_lflag |= ICANON; // if term->term_mode == VT100MODE_COOKED
00164 #endif
00165 
00166     t->c_cc[VEOF]   = CEOF;
00167     t->c_cc[VEOL]   = _POSIX_VDISABLE;
00168     t->c_cc[VEOL2]  = _POSIX_VDISABLE;
00169     t->c_cc[VERASE] = CERASE;
00170     t->c_cc[VWERASE]= CWERASE;
00171     t->c_cc[VKILL]  = CKILL;
00172     t->c_cc[VREPRINT]=CREPRINT;
00173     t->c_cc[VINTR]  = CINTR;
00174     t->c_cc[VQUIT]  = _POSIX_VDISABLE;
00175     t->c_cc[VSUSP]  = CSUSP;
00176     t->c_cc[VSTART] = CSTART;
00177     t->c_cc[VSTOP] = CSTOP;
00178     t->c_cc[VLNEXT] = CLNEXT;
00179     t->c_cc[VDISCARD]=CDISCARD;
00180     t->c_cc[VMIN] = CMIN;
00181     t->c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
00182 
00183   }
00184 
00185       return 0;
00186 
00187     case TCSETS:
00188     case TCSETSW:
00189     case TCSETSF:
00190   {
00191     //vt100_tcsetattr(term, (struct termios *)argp);
00192     struct termios const *t = va_arg(args, struct termios const *);
00193 
00194     // XXX: well, we're cheating, get this from the other side!
00195 
00196     l4_vcon_attr_t l4a;
00197     l4a.i_flags = t->c_iflag;
00198     l4a.o_flags = t->c_oflag; // output flags
00199     l4a.l_flags = t->c_lflag; // local flags
00200     _s->set_attr(&l4a);
00201   }
00202       return 0;
00203 
00204     default:
00205       break;
00206   };
00207   return -EINVAL;
00208 }
